description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Drowning Cross
description: Find your boyfriend before the night takes him away forever. It's all your fault, after all! Just like always.

name: Timeless
description: Timeless is a classic platforming game with a small twist, the ability to either enhance the player character's speed (and slipperiness) or stop their momentum instantly.

name: Night of the Scarecrows
description: Wrong turn, wrong place. Now you are in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by horde of faceless creatures... and you are very short on ammo.

name: They Are Beasts
description: They Are Beasts is a third-person shooter in which you will fight an army of undead, led by the most vile creatures of darkness, and wrest your soul from the demon's tenacious claws. Do not forget to recharge!

name: Nor'Easter
description: Nor’easter is a classic point-and-click adventure game inspired by the lumberjack folklore of Northern America. As a brave jackalope befriend strange, magical creatures, help a lost man find his children and save the woodlands from endless winter!

name: Aozora Under Girls: Karsome Irony
description: "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome Irony" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Girls under the Blue Sky", so we have created a special customized "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome...

name: Marble Partner
description: Go and capture all the elves. Embark on an adventure, collect all the badges and become a master wizard.

name: Fork Knights
description: Fork Knights is a light-hearted fencing brawler featuring food fighters battling it out for BBQ domination. Fight with up to four players locally.

name: Night Sing
description: Night Sing is a third-person-shooter game with RPG elements developed by Valkyrie Stuidio with Unity. With 3D character and animations, the game can bring you horror that's so real you can feel it in your "hearts".

name: Trickster VR: Horde Attack!
description: Your daily fix of the hack&slash wave attack action. Fast paced and easy to get into. Use a varied arsenal of awesome magic weapons to win that top spot on the Orc Slayer Leaderboard. Plus, it's 100% free!

name: Dead Hunter
description: In the game Dead Hunter you're playing for the demon hunter which deals with the destruction of evil creatures. Defeat the ancient evil!

name: Cleaner
description: Stickmen`s civilization is at risk. Mutated excrements burst out of the sewers and flooded the cities. Kill the vile monsters and clean the world from the walking filth!

name: Light of the Locked World
description: Light of the Locked World is a fantasy RPG with local co-op and PVP, inspired by oldschool MMOs like Ultima Online and RuneScape.

name: Mortal Glory
description: Mortal Glory is a fantasy-themed tactical roguelike game about recruiting a team of gladiators and pitting them against brutal competition in a blood-soaked tournament. Train your gladiators, find a legendary sword, learn ancient spells, recruit a celebrity, cheat - do whatever it takes to bring glory to your name!

name: Insectipede
description: A New Bug Blasting Arcade Game! Blast your way through 50 Challenging Stages with Waves of Insects and UFOs, Power-Ups, and Arcade High Scores. Time To Bug Out... Are You Ready For It?

name: Hardcore Parkour
description: Hardcore Parkour is a street arts game combining free running, parkour, graffiti and break-dance where you choose your own means to overcome your obstacles with both efficiency and style.

name: Orpheus's Dream
description: Orpheus’s Dream is an 3D isometric-inspired puzzle game with storytelling elements. Explore an amnesiac’s family house and recover lost memories of him and his cat.

name: Amazing: A House In Kansas VR
description: Escape a house caught in a tornado, before the gas ignites and the house is blown up with you in it. Oh, did we say that you also have to do this whilst the housing is spinning around, and in VR?

name: Gamehunt
description: Gamehunt - A game where you play as a rabbit - "Tom", your goal is to go through a lot of difficult levels and get to his beloved rabbit. The game features 10 unique and challenging levels, try to pass all and get the most valuable gift.

name: Dwarven Skykeep
description: Dwarven Skykeep is a cute and humorous pixel-art card management sim in a medieval world of wizardry! Dive into the realm of Dwarves and start building the most epic tower using the power of magical cards from your deck

name: Crunch Element
description: Blast through destructible compounds and slay cyborgs in virtual reality! Take cover as debris, lead, and lasers whiz past your head and prepare to return fire! Can you smash into a compound and eradicate the frenzied assailants with cutthroat efficiency?

name: Sudoku 9X16X25
description: Sudoku is an amazing puzzle for everyone. Great for brain training.

name: Blautopf VR: Geheimnis der Lau
description: The Blautopf cave system is one of the most spectacular natural phenomena of Southern Germany. It is only accessible to scientists. With BlautopfVR - The Secrets of Lau you can now explore these hidden places in a Mystery Adventure Game for HTC Vive.Every year, over half a million tourist are drawn to the Blautopf in Blaubeuren.

name: Guardian of the Future
description: In this fantasy visual novel, you will play as Miyuri, the heiress of the great Bakuto clan of adherents to ancient martial arts. She has inherited a very important ability from her deceased mother: a mysterious power that would help save the world.

name: Ashes 2
description: Ashes 2 is a post-apocalyptic game in the 'zombie survival' genre. This is result of the evolution of the game Ashes. This is author's project was created especially for fans of survival.

name: Jetboy
description: Jetboy is a retro supercharged pixel jetpacking shooter with a pumping metal soundtrack.

name: Nordlicht
description: Nordlicht is an adventure-game where you accompany an unusual family on its fascinating journey to the cold north. During the journey, they encounter mysterious star-signs of the polar night, and have to overcome nature's dangers to confront their fears.

name: Fruit Postal Service
description: Fruit Postal Service is a package-delivery, battle-racing game where you play as members of the Fruit Postal Service: Walter Melon, Bandana-nana, Jack Apple, and more! Use your unique fruity abilities to deliver the most fruit to your customers and become employee of the month!

name: CLS: Signal Person
description: Guide cranes through lifting operations on a virtual job site; learn and practice the standard OSHA and ASME hand signals; sharpen your skills by dealing with crane limitations and working in hazardous scenarios.

name: World Leader Card Game
description: Inspired by much older card games like magic the gathering, and Yugioh, World Leader Card Game (WLCG) seeks to engage the player, by giving them a set of cards that they need to utilize in order destroy their opponent's life bar.

name: The Dark Veil: West Haven
description: In this Third-Person Survival Horror, Azdriel writhes underneath the mysterious Dark Veil. Cyrus continues on his mission to track down a powerful wizard in hopes of procuring a magical item to save his wife. While traveling Cyrus gets detoured from his path and is forced to enter West Haven.

name: Dating Life: Miley X Emily
description: Play as Miley as she goes on her first date in years, but her partner might not be who she expected after she inputted her own details incorrectly it leads to an unexpected date between two usually heterosexual women. Despite the strange twist of fate and their own feelings they decide to 'just go with it' and enjoy the night together.

name: rOt 3D
description: Minimal 3D puzzle game which goal is to get The Ball to the WinBox using the Circles in the scenes. Old obstacles from the franchise, and the return of One Chance Mode.

name: The Last Cowboy
description: Feel like a real hero of the Wild West. Put on your hat, become a cowboy and protect your flock.

name: Grid Magic
description: A block puzzle game to fill some time, or a training simulator of a form of magic that can save the world? — Why not both?

name: Bocce VR
description: Bocce VR it's a fun sport game, where you can play against computer

name: Rifle MarksMan
description: Rifle MarksMan is a 2D platformer with a side view, the task is to go through a maze looking for multi-colored keys to the door for further progress through the level.

name: Zach-Like
description: Zach-Like is a book of behind-the-scenes design documents from Zachtronics. The digital version of Zach-Like contains the full contents of the book, a bunch of terrible games that Zach made before SpaceChem, and some prototypes and early builds of Zachtronics games, both released and... not.

name: SpritePile
description: Create Sprite Stacks quickly and easily! View them in 2D/3D and export them for use in your game in seconds!

name: Tank Nova
description: Tank Nova is a tank game with interesting stories.

name: GuildBound
description: Guildbound is an open-world Story RPG featuring many quests, dungeons, crafting, building, recruiting, character progression and much more

name: Lost Egg
description: The first of low-price series of Kimidorisoft! A hard action adventure game depicting raw egg ecstasy and bravery.Aim for a frying pan that rolls past various stages with awkward music.

name: Spider Shooting Bee
description: Control your spider. Avoid the bees that came. And fire bullets to destroy the bees.

name: Layers of the Machine
description: Layers Of The Machine is a singleplayer first person shooter in a dark scifi setting. You follow the story of Liam, a technician doing work for the Machines in their underground world ("The Layers").

name: Mi Mi Mi
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: ZorroMoro
description: Enjoyable FPS Game, infinite stages doesnt over ZorroMoro. Different weapon types, different tactics. The biggest problem probably bullet. You have to fix it. Down the enemies. Enemies can come everywhere.

name: Ping Redux
description: Ping Redux has 100+ levels including 12 bosses that are inspired by classic games to help keep the gameplay varied. Bounce off the walls and obstacles and reach the succulent tasty orange.

name: Svoboda 1945: Liberation
description:
The horrors of World War II are over, but peace never came to the Czech village of Svoboda. You were sent to investigate a decades-old feud. Who can you trust to explain what happened? How was your family involved? Talk to witnesses to uncover the troubled past.

Svoboda 1945: Liberation is a unique blend of adventure gameplay, full-motion video interviews with real actors and historically-accurate interactive memories of people who lived through the chaos of the aftermath of World War 2. Discover the secret history of your own family in a captivating story about reconciliation with the dark past.

name: Breaking Box
description: Breaking Box is a 3D sandbox puzzle game with physics-based puzzles.

name: Zumoubattoru
description: Slap and push your way past the sumo wrestlers who are standing in your way of becoming the sumo champion!

name: Figment 2: Creed Valley
description: Figment 2: Creed Valley is an encore to Figment. Dusty and Piper have restored peace in The Mind, however, a new adversary is threatening its balance. Our two heroes must travel to Creed Valley, where The Mind’s beliefs and ideals are formed, to face their most menacing and theatrical foe so far.

name: Ambidangerous
description: Ambidangerous is a top-down shooter that puts your ambidexterity to the test. Simultaneously control two elite soldiers as you fight your way through four randomized areas, five unique bosses, and a dozen enemy types. Take the challenge alone or share the controller with a friend for co-op play!

name: Cannibal Chickens
description: Even chickens love chicken! A feeding frenzy for up to four players! Straightforward play for casual and hardcore gamers alike!

name: Climbros
description: Climbros is an addictive two-dimensional arcade game in which you will be able to climb. You can play in single player mode or with a group of friends in local cooperation mode. Surprise, amusement, helplessness, joy, satisfaction - expect a whole range of emotions.

name: Dry Drowning
description: Dry Drowning is a psychological investigative visual novel set in a futuristic dystopian city. Follow the story of Mordred Foley, an unscrupulous private detective haunted by his dark past, and look into a series of macabre serial killings inspired by Greek mythology.

name: Save Daddy Trump
description: Be a hero woman and save your captured daddy Trump from evil creatures in this meme style 3d platformer. Use magic, beat enemy and collect enough money to save daddy Trump and USA...

name: Southbound
description: "Southbound" is an oldschool 2D JRPG with the flavor of some classic JRPGs.

name: Sophie's Dice
description: The ultimate 3D dice roller. Make and roll whatever dice you need.

name: Wanna Survive
description: HIGH SPEED ZOMBIE TACTICS - Fight mobs of undead attacking from all sides in this streamlined turn-based tactics that emphasizes unit placement and synergies. Help the survivors live through fights and manage their rations to avoid permanent death, and they just might be able to reach the Sanctuary.

name: Plagueworld
description: Adveture game based on medieval times, where you take the role of a hero that needs to fight and destroy the plague that invaded world.

name: Automobilista 2
description: Automobilista 2 once again puts you in the driving seat of an advanced and diverse racing simulator - now with incredible graphical quality, high profile cars and tracks, advanced dynamic track condition system and VR support.

name: Bugs 'N Boo Hags
description: PAINT THE TOWN BLUE in this frenetic mashup of tower defense and retro-style platforming action inspired by South Carolina Lowcountry folklore, history, and culture!

name: The PIT: Broken Bones
description: The Pit is a turn-based tactical game set in dark fantasy. You will manage the guild of gladiators, fight battles for life and death.

name: That's Pretty Clever
description: Chose clever, score better! The clever dice game where you try to beat the community in weekly challenges for the highscore.

name: ZIC: Survival
description: ZIC: Survival is a survival shooter where you feel The Zombie Apocalypse & become The Zombie Hunter!

name: Xiu's SuperMarket
description: 這是一個利用腳色，靠著技能攻打怪物，可以得到金幣用來購買更高等的武器，每當升等可以增加技能點來提升角色的技能，而隨著關卡上升，怪物的等級也會依循上升，並且有三種職業可以進行選擇遊玩，每種職業擁有不同的技能，以後會陸續新增更多職業。

name: Forest of Evil
description: A knight of the crusades embarks upon a long journey home after the wars. Little does he know, that he is about to stumble upon a deep darkness. Will he have the strength to survive the Night and tear through the veil of evil to bring forth the light of a new dawn? Or will he succumb to the darkness?

name: Drawing Path
description: Reflect and draw! Drawing Path is a game that aims to make you reflect in order to solve levels where you have to collect all the balls in the cup.

name: Awesome taxi
description: Awesome Taxi - This is an arcade game in which the player assumes the role of a space taxi driver.

name: Backspace Bouken
description: Type your way through absurd encounters and mysterious puzzles in this old-school typing dungeon crawler.

name: Time Travelling Navy Seal Ninja Warrior
description: Using the skills of a Navy Seal and the grace of a Ninja Warrior, travel through time to different eras to defeat the forces of evil! Use stealth and mercy to avoid damaging the space time continuum. Or ignore that and kill everyone!

name: Windy Kingdom
description: This is a Sandbox game project, the simulation farm combined with defense is inspired by "Harvest moon" and "Plant vs zombie". The gameplay of Windykingdom in the top-down perspective, Player will play a character from the future and is trying to survive in a kingdom full of women and monsters.

name: Seven Nations
description: The leaders of the seven nations failed to reach a peace agreement. All kingdoms are now at war.

name: Chibi Volleyball
description: Beach volleyball by 1v1 or 2v2 play modes with chibi anime style. If you like the old classic Blobby Volley (two jelly beans playing volleyball), this game is for you! Comes along with fully customizable game options.

name: Jack Move
description: Jack Move is a unique blend of gritty cyberpunk story telling, turn based battles and beautiful modern pixel art. Take on the role of Noa, a vigilante hacker who is thrust into a world of murder, kidnapping and dark research after her father goes missing.

name: Welcome to Paradise
description: Welcome to SEX Paradise!!! Hot girls are waiting for you!!! Experience amazing moments on the Tropical Island in the middle of the ocean. Collect magical orbs to open the portal leading to the SEXY mermaid caves.

name: Stupid Dungeon
description: It has become a habit for an anchor to stop updating the video. He lives in a beautiful sound every day and can't extricate himself. Suddenly one day, when he woke up, everything around him had changed, and all evils would be liquidated here.

name: Chain Saw
description: Chain Saw is a survival game. You have to go through various tests, find the right way out, and run away from the maniac. The game will be in every way to mock you, and scare.

name: Rose Garden at the World's End
description: 为了亲眼去看看那名孤独的女性和传说中的蔷薇花园，莉亚开启了她的旅程。

name: The Ring of Truth
description: The Ring of Truth is an exploration story game set in an abandoned factory.

name: StalinGulag
description: StalinGULAG is a town-planning simulator with elements of survival. You are responsible for the leadership of the camp system of the Soviet Union.

name: Virtual Debating Chamber
description: New Zealand Parliament’s Virtual Debating Chamber (VDC) is a Virtual Reality experience that takes you on a guided exploration of the heart of New Zealand's legislature. It is captured through Photogrammetry and 3D scanning for an immersive and interactive experience.

name: Desert of the Dead
description: You are a mysterious wanderer traveling through the wilderness of the wild west. In cities and towns, people began to disappear, as in many cities the population became infected with a virus which turns people into zombies, and it is rumored that people from the government are behind this.

name: Zorg: The Typing Warrior
description: Meet Zorg, an out of it barbarian who loves loads of drinks and adventures. An indie game in which your ability to type fast is the best weapon to win.

name: Ancient knowledge
description: Ancient knowledge adventure game in which you have to solve the mystery of the ancient Indian city

name: Bepuzzled Space Jigsaw Puzzle
description: 108 Space puzzles to complete! Interesting space rockets, space suits and celestial bodies. Challenge yourself with the timer and resist the urge to use hints. Friendly User Interface for easy selection and 'magnetic' pieces for convenience. Calming music, which can be muted.

name: Victorian Mysteries: Woman in White
description: Discover the secret of the mysterious woman in white in this hidden-object game. Based on the 1860 novel by Wilkie Collins, the game takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!

name: Logistical 2: Indonesia
description: Logistical 2: Indonesia spans many islands in a wonderful tropical climate. Build your truck empire to cover the many islands and help the local tourism industries.

name: Dancing Girl
description:
This is a casual game with novel gameplay, sexy girls, dynamic music and hot dance.

Game-play: Throw rubber balls at sexy hot dancing girl

Features:

- Realistic style of the picture has strong sense of substitution
- Novelty and Unique Play
- Cute, sexy girl
- Exquisite hot dance
- Dynamic music

name: Master of the Forbidden Sea
description: Enter the waters of the Forbidden Sea. Dive to the bottom and collect 12-artifacts. Avoid starvation, battle strange monsters, and voyage past the point of no return.

name: Latest Jump Cube Game
description: Play this challenging latest jump game and test your skills. Compete with your friends to reach the highest level of the latest jumping cube, while experiencing the joy of playing this enthralling game. The cross moving characters will grab your attention and will challenge you to go further.

name: Snowrifters VEX
description: This is a Virtual Vehicle Exhibition in a museum like environment where you can teleport around and look at the models. A Showcase Room for the vehicles, some props and weapons from the race game Snowrifters. Get an impression of the unique design from Timon Sager.

name: Sefirot Shards
description: Sefirot Shards - a turn-based strategy game with RPG and CCG elements, imbued with the spirit of classic fantasy.Plunge into a world where the gods are playing their deadly game. Gather a squad and solve all the secrets that Sefirot has prepared for you.

name: There Will Be Ink
description: There Will Be Ink is a tactical action game for 1-4 players. Play solo or with friends in battles between stick figure armies on a paper notepad, just like you used to draw in class instead of paying attention!

name: Don't Go into the Woods
description: A 10 year old boy, lost in the woods, must rescue his sister and find his way home. Explore, survive, and craft tools to help navigate the woods, help the local creatures, and find a way to escape the woods before you lose your mind.

name: CountryBalls Heroes
description: CountryBalls Heroes is a game where you get to play as your favorite Countryball. Become a legend by leading massive Countryball armies. Create your forces, build master-planned cities, gather powerful artifacts and prove that your Countryball is the most powerful.

name: J Connect
description: J Connect is an indie puzzle game, you simply have to connect the different colors with each other to occupy all the space, it seems easy, but it is not.

name: Endless Circle
description: Endless Circle is a perfect game to have a good time while you face a challenge of moderate difficulty, being a simple and easy to understand game.

name: War Solution
description: Whole wars were won by the use of Math. From ingenious attack machines in Middle Ages to cryptographics codes in modern wars. In 'War Solution' your calculations and reasoning skills will be put to the test to solve puzzles and destroy the enemies. Are you ready for it?

name: Scallywag's Honor
description: The Caribbean Sea, your sea, has been the home of true freedom for ages. Calico Jack, William Kidd, and many other great pirates had sailed these waters in the past.

name: PokeyPoke
description:
Cling to and bounce from ceiling to wall to cliff face. Full, 360-degree spear aim makes PokeyPoke a uniquely expressive, satisfying and difficult to master platformer that handles like no other.

No powerups, no artificial gates, no monsters, no skill trees. Just you, your spear and your environment. The trials are a test of what you have learned and mastered, nothing more.

Collect optional hidden gems by climbing, swinging and bouncing across an intricately hand-crafted island. Challenges lie temptingly around every corner, and then around the corner from that. Tackle the trials at your own pace and carve your own journey through the island.

The Trials are tough, but they reward courage and perseverance. When you fail you're quickly thrown straight back into the action with instant respawns, armed with one more attempt's worth of knowledge and practice.

name: Aeon's End
description: Deck building with a twist! Lead a team of mages against the Nameless in this magic-based card battle game and save the city of Gravehold!

name: Nekoland Studio
description: The easiest game making tool, RPG maker for beginners and non-programmers!

name: Garden Story
description: Unify a broken community as the newly-appointed Guardian of The Grove. Traverse a vibrant island to combat invasive Rot, inspire its inhabitants, and rebuild your home. You won't have to do this alone: fruity friends await, ready to lend a hand!

name: Room 208
description: Victor Rockford, a spiritual medium has been asked to use his otherworldly abilities to stop the EVIL that resides inside Room 208 of 'The Great Leaf Hotel'. Does he have what it takes to put a stop EVIL? Or will the EVIL claim yet another victim?

name: Discontinue
description: Discontinue is a competitive VR room-scale disc throwing game experience with over 8192 levels, your goal is to survive your chosen generated synthwave/cyberpunk style parkour and set a new high score. Are you up for this challenge?

name: Blood and Mead
description: A crazy drunk Viking sets off on epic adventure across a vast ancient land filled with action and mystery. Craft Mead and battle Vikings, demons and the Norse Gods themselves in this classic 2D adventure platformer.

name: Tower Ascend
description: Dash, wall-jump, and use power-ups to escape your doom and reach new heights in this infinitely scrolling platformer. Play on your own and try to reach new heights, or play with up to four local players in a fight to become the last man standing!

name: D.A.M.A.G.E
description: Before you strategy with a unique gameplay. Take control of the squad heavy machinery, which you can collect from different parts and go into battle!

name: ADM 2: When Worlds Collide
description: Take control of various unique characters, master various skills and spells, slay enemies and save the world.

name: Born of Fire
description: A brand new card game is coming! The game combines the gameplay of deck-building and Roguelike. With innovative time sequence battles, the battles are fast pace and incredibly exciting. In addition to the traditional Roguelike mode, you can challenge players from around the world.

name: Travel story
description: This is a horizontal version of the simulation + GAL element game. The land of the ancient demon king of "Highland Island" has changed from time to time. Today, this island is already a very famous tourist attraction. I don't know if it is a conspiracy or a fate. You are also a famous otaku in a different world.

name: Gooberries
description: Design and build a universe of tiny terrariums in this quirky and futuristic farm sim and management game with it's goal set on automation. With a little time and tending you'll unlock everything required to fully automate your terrariums and turn your creation into a berry producing machine.

name: Fancy Skiing: Speed
description: "Fancy Skiing" is a series of games developed by Hash Technology, which has been welcomed by players around the world. ​Compared to the earliest version “Fancy Skiing VR”, "Fancy Skiing: Speed" has been made some changes, added a level mode, and set up a world...

name: Truck the System
description: Build your truck. Race other players through player-made skill courses. Fail miserably. Take out your frustrations with missiles and miniguns.

name: Aura
description: Aura is the ultimate Jump and Run survival game. Run through endless forests, volcanic caverns, magical forests and the vast cold of the tundra. Survive as long as possible and show the world that you are the ultimate Aura Warrior!

name: Aliens and Umbrellas
description: Shoot Aliens with Umbrellas and other Aliens

name: Dive with Sylvia VR
description: Explore the beauty and serenity of a real reef in Belize with famed oceanographer and National Geographic Explorer-in-Residence Dr. Sylvia Earle. No two dives are the same.

name: Swordbreaker: Origins
description: An illustrated text quest in the Swordbreaker universe. The prequel tells about the life and adventures of Swordbreaker from his childhood, and before the events in the mysterious castle.

name: Staden under Gamlestaden
description: Experience the town of Nya Lödöse in the early 16th century! Meet the merchant, the gravedigger, the herbalist and the other town residents and help them in three quests! The game is based on knowledge that has been developed through archaeological investigations in Gamlestaden, Gothenburg.

name: Another Dawn
description: A quiet holiday on a tropical island suddenly becomes your worst nightmare when a ruthless criminal organization kidnaps your family. Battle against hunger, thirst, unscrupulous mercenaries and wild creatures in order to stay alive and save your beloved!

name: Ehandcipation
description: Shoot'em up brawler! 1-4 players. Gather power ups, become the final boss of this bullet hell arena and keep your enemies in the palm of your hand!

name: Orc Colony
description: Take command of your first colony as the Orc Prince. Dig, Build and Expand your colony deeper underground.

name: Horresco Referens
description: You are a soldier from an alien race exiled from its native planet. Armed with a deck of cards, your goal is to make sure that your new home never gets colonized by the neighboring civilizations.

name: L'Etranger
description: A unique visual novel about the high school experiences in alternate-history East Asia.

name: Sheep.io
description: Can you create the biggest flock?

name: Ruins Seeker
description: An adventurer named Quem is the first person to step foot inside "Heaven's Ladder" in 500 years. But not long after, she's cursed by a strange, shadowy monster. Now she must reach the top of Heaven's Ladder, and hopefully, break the spell.

name: Red Star Raider
description: Red Star Raider is a fast paced, action packed platform shooter presented in a retro style and not just in the visual sense. Players will have to master Parry, dodge, reflect, wall slide and many more skills.

name: Catch a Duck
description: Face the challenge of catching ducks in a funny hand drawn forest. Outsmart hunters, cause a brawl between a wolf and a bear, use hideouts, move through underground tunnels, avoid traps but make enemies fall into them ! Be a sly fox !

name: Hex Kingdoms
description: Hex Kingdoms is a turn-based strategy game set in medevial times with fantasy themes. Expand your kingdom, set up your defenses, train soldiers and monsters to become the only ruler of the land.

name: Australian Football Coach 2019
description: Coach your team to the premiership flag! Australian Football Coach is the premier Aussie Rules Football management game. Manage your players, tactics, and salary cap as you fight for glory!

name: Ritual: Sorcerer Angel
description: Watch the game play itself! Cast magic spells and watch the mayhem unfold in chaotic and unpredictable way.

name: Blood and Lust
description: A short free bara visual novel with Roman gladiators and a murder mystery!

name: Still There
description:
A sci-fi adventure into space station management, mysterious radio messages, motherfucking AIs, sociopathic people in charge, and finding one's true self in a galaxy way too far, far away.

How far is far enough?

name: Unsweet
description: Unsweet is a cinematic and colorful platformer that will give you endless fun, catchy gameplay and a touching story about the hero's grand and tragic journey through the world of ice cream, chocolate, rainbow and alive sweets

name: Doom: Eternal - Deluxe Edition
description:
As the Doom Slayer you return to find Earth has suffered a demonic invasion. Discover the Slayer’s origins and his enduring mission to Raze Hell.

The Doom Eternal Deluxe Edition includes:
Year One Pass with two campaign add-ons.
Demonic Slayer Skin.
Classic Weapon Sound Pack.

name: Bouncy Bullets
description: In a world where the sky is blue and water is pink, with icebergs replaced by floating ice-creams, Bouncy Bullets is a colourfully vibrant first-person shooter that will task players to traverse wonderful terrains, in a bid to reach the portal that awaits them at the end of every level!

name: FIFA 20: Champions Edition
description: Powered by Frostbite, EA SPORTS FIFA 20 for PC brings two sides of The World’s Game to life - the prestige of the professional stage and an all-new, authentic street football experience in EA SPORTS VOLTA. FIFA 20 innovates across the game, FOOTBALL INTELLIGENCE unlocks an unprecedented platform for gameplay realism, FIFA Ultimate Team offers more ways to build your dream squad and EA SPORTS VOLTA returns the game to the street with an authentic form of small-sided football.
